Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video does not show the Saudi king in attendance at the church inauguration.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the video shows the church inauguration attended by the Saudi king, when in fact, it was a celebration of the "Year of Tolerance".
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or mention in UAE media reports about the king's attendance at the event.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that the video shows the church inauguration, when it actually shows a celebration of the "Year of Tolerance".
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the video was shared with a misleading claim to create a false narrative about the Saudi king's attendance at the church inauguration.
